title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

Act 2000 (Exempted Development) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development act 2000 (exempted development) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2021

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 2. Schedule 2 of the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. Schedule 2 of the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 (S.I. 

No. 600 of 2001) is amended, in Part 1, by – 

(a) 

the substitution of the following text for the text in column (1) 
under the heading CLASS 20C: 

“Temporary use as a school of any structure formerly used as a 
school, hall, club, art gallery, museum, library, reading room, 
gymnasium, or other public building, or any structure normally used 
for religious instruction”; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 (b) 

the insertion of the following after CLASS 20C: 

[114] 3 

“ 

CLASS 20D 

Development consisting 
of – 

The erection on land on 
which a school is 
situated of a structure to 
facilitate the continued 
delivery of education.
text_norm: 2 schedule 2 planning development regulation 2001 (s.i no 600 2001) amended part 1 - (a) substitution following text text column (1) heading class 20c temporary use school structure formerly used school hall club art gallery museum library reading room gymnasium public building structure normally used religious instruction notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 19th march 2021 (b) insertion following class 20c 114 3 class 20d development consisting - erection land school situated structure facilitate continued delivery education

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 1. No such structure shall be erected for a
text_raw:
1. No such structure shall be erected for a 

period exceeding 5 years.
text_norm: 1 structure shall erected period exceeding 5 year

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 2. The gross floor area of such structure
text_raw:
2. The gross floor area of such structure 

shall not exceed 30% of the gross floor 
area of the existing school.
text_norm: 2 gross floor area structure shall exceed 30 gross floor area existing school

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 3. No such structure shall exceed two
text_raw:
3. No such structure shall exceed two 

storeys.

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 4. Distance to party boundary -
text_raw:
4. Distance to party boundary - 

(a) any single storey structure shall 
be a distance of not less than 2 
metres from any party boundary, 
(b) any two-storey extension facing 
an existing dwelling shall be a 
distance no less than 22 metres 
from the main part of the 
dwelling, or 

(c) any two-storey extension closer 
than 12.5m to a party boundary, 
or facing and closer than 22 
metres to the dwelling shall - 
(i) have no windows 
overlooking, or 
(ii) have obscure glass.
text_norm: 4 distance party boundary - (a) single storey structure shall distance le 2 metre party boundary (b) two-storey extension facing existing dwelling shall distance le 22 metre main part dwelling (c) two-storey extension closer 12.5m party boundary facing closer 22 metre dwelling shall - (i) window overlooking (ii) obscure glass

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 5. Such structure shall comply with the
text_raw:
5. Such structure shall comply with the 

Department of Education Primary and 
Post Primary Technical Guidance 
Documents for the time being in force. 

“ 

(c) 

the substitution of the following text for the text in column (1) 
under the heading CLASS 57: 

“The extension of a school, where the school has not been 
previously extended under a CLASS 57 exemption, by the 
construction or erection of an extension to the side or rear of the 
school.” 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [114] 

(d) 

the substitution of the following text for the text in column (2) in 
so far as it relates to CLASS 57: 

“
text_norm: 5 structure shall comply department education primary post primary technical guidance document time force (c) substitution following text text column (1) heading class 57 extension school school previously extended class 57 exemption construction erection extension side rear school 4 114 (d) substitution following text text column (2) far relates class 57

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 1. The floor area of any such extension shall not
text_raw:
1. The floor area of any such extension shall not 

exceed 210 square metres.
text_norm: 1 floor area extension shall exceed 210 square metre

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 2. No such structure shall be above the ground floor.
text_raw: 2. No such structure shall be above the ground floor.

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 3. Any extension shall be a distance of not less than
text_raw:
3. Any extension shall be a distance of not less than 

2 metres from any party boundary.
text_norm: 3 extension shall distance le 2 metre party boundary

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 4. An exemption under this class shall only be
text_raw:
4. An exemption under this class shall only be 

availed of once.

title: to which the following regulations apply would not offend against principles of
heading: 5. Such structure shall comply with the Department
text_raw:
5. Such structure shall comply with the Department 
of Education Primary and Post Primary Technical 
Guidance Documents for the time being in force. 

” 

GIVEN under my hand, 

16 March, 2021. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister of State at the Department of Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage
